idea-plugin.name: XSLT Debugger
idea-plugin.description: Allows interactive debugging of XSLT stylesheets.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Xalan Support. To debug with Xalan instead of SAXON, a supported Xalan version (2.7.x) should be present in the classpath or "-Dxslt.transformer.type=xalan" should be added as VM argument for the run configuration. Debugging with SAXON can be forced by adding "-Dxslt.transformer.type=saxon".
